    • Constructor Detail

      • CollectoClient

        public CollectoClient​(java.lang.String serverIP,
                      int port)
        Constructor that takes serverIP and port as parameters. Both are setup in main method

      • CollectoClient

        public CollectoClient()
        Constructor that takes no parameters. Initialises client and view without custom ip and port, thus keeping UT server address

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the CollectoClient, create a connection. Once HELLO handshake handled New thread serverhandler(handle server input) is started and clientTUI is started(handle user input)

                      throws exitProgram

      • determineMove

        public void determineMove()
        DetermineMove called in Client when its our turn to make move. In normal CollectoClient only prints a string asking for move Made in order to facilitate inheritance in CollectoComputerClient

      • getPoints

        public static int getPoints​(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> collected)

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main asking for ip:port if user does not want to play on UT server. Creates and launches CollectoClient accordingly
